BotShield Recommends

Robots.txt

  • Set general restrictions and permissions for crawlers
  • Allows explicit instructions for individual crawlers
  • Set general restrictions and permissions for crawlers
Know Your Options

Robots.txt

  • Most popular
  • Well respected
  • Easy to implement

Active Blocking

  • Not accessible
  • False positives
  • Hard to implement

NoAI Meta Tag

  • Rarely used
  • Unknown impact
  • Easy to implement

ai.txt

  • Very new
  • Legal focus
  • Quicker to update
